name: rex-analyzer
displayName: Golang Template Validator and Language Server
description: Validates Go template variables in .html/.tmpl files and provides intellisense, go to definition etc

rex-analyzer.goAnalyzerPath.description: Path to the rex-analyzer binary. Leave empty to use the bundled binary.

rex-analyzer.sourceDir.description: Go source directory relative to the workspace root, passed as the -dir flag to the CLI (e.g. 'sample' if your Go files live in a subdirectory).

rex-analyzer.templateRoot.description: Root directory for templates, relative to sourceDir, passed as the -template-root flag (e.g. 'templates').

rex-analyzer.templateBaseDir.description: Base directory for templates, relative to the workspace root, used as the -template-base-dir flag. If empty, defaults to the workspace root.

rex-analyzer.contextFile.description: Path to a JSON file containing additional context variables (e.g. injected by middleware). Can be absolute or relative to workspace root.

rex-analyzer.debounceMs.description: Debounce delay in milliseconds before re-validating on file change.

scripts.vscode:prepublish: npm run compile && npm run build-analyzer
